#oklaed A10: Blog and develop trust with Ps & community.
#oklaed Missed the Teacher part of ? : For Ts, lots of formative assessment!!!
#oklaed A9: By being such a frequent and non-interrupting visitor to classrooms & participate in PLCs.
#oklaed A8: Model effective collaboration with Ts & praise good collaboration between Ts.
#oklaed A7: By asking good questions, facilitating effective learning skills, & assessing fairly with good useful feedback.
#oklaed A6: Transparency, trust and PLC / PD support.
#oklaed A5: Simple -trust them!!!
#oklaed A4: How about Covey's Eight Habits (he added one, remember)???
#oklaed A3: They all should - all should be considered - then responded in reply and/or action.
#oklaed A2: By empathesizing and by honestly show praise for good effort.
#oklaed A1: Sets the table for a meaningful school culture!
#oklaed John Bennett, Emeritus in Midlothian, Virginia.
